Observed at: Kelowna Airport 6:10 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.5°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. A few showers beginning this morning. Snow level 1400 metres rising to 1700 metres this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to 1400 metres near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 14.
